title: Gong-The 1991 GAS Tape
description:
GONG APPRECIATION SOCIETY - "The 1991 GAS Tape"

GAS Subscribers 1991 Tape
GAS 1991 Cassette
1991 release 

Side 1 (CD1):

1) Intro (3:08) - (Allen)*
2) Can't Kill Me Megamix (4:30) - (Allen - Stof) Sampled reconstructed, given to Daevid in France    
3) Message From Tom (0:24) - (Tom The Poet)*
4) 10 Year Resolutions(5:30) - (Allen)*
5) Crystal Machine (8:06) - (Blake)+
6) Paragong Jam (22:29) - (C.O.I.T.) 1Ã‚Â° incarnation of Paragong '74 whenDaevid & Gilli left Gong 

Side 2 (CD2):

1) Intro (Dream Real Time) (3:56) - (Allen)*
2) Goddess Invocation (4:38) - (Smyth) From tv Gong reunion not deemed interesting for broadcast 
3) Broken Waves (9:58) - (Maitra) Wonderful tabla playing from Gongmaison's Shy(a)mal Maitra
4) Tick Tock Gliss (12:19) - (C.O.I.T.)+
5) Tom The Poet (2:01) - (Tom The Poet)*
6) Outro (Anhsirk Erah) (10:35) - (Allen)

Notes on tape cover:

*Part of a radio show constructed, compiled and hosted once a week by Daevid. Broadcast in 
Australia in the mid 80s.
+Live Gong, 1974. Short listed for the "Live Etc" album.

My notes:

d1t1) Background collage used by Daevid a few times, including 1973 Radio Gnome Direct Broadcast
d1t5) Sold to the Highest Buddha, not The Octave Doctors & The Crystal Machine
d1t6) Fohat Digs Holes in Space - Why Are We Sleeping? Date seems wrong. Paragong Feb to Apr 1973
d2t4) Zero The Hero And The Witch's Spell

Mastered to DAT and copied in dolby B by Sound Services. Cover By Jonny.

Lineage: Original GAS tape > wav > flac > you. No noise reduction.
Trasferred from analog, uploaded and shared by Maclen Feb 2005
